title: Analysis: Russia's economic defences likely to crumble over time under sanctions onslaught
description: Russia has spent the past seven years building up formidable financial defences, yet in the long run, its economy is unlikely to withstand the onslaught of coordinated sanctions from the West.
content: LONDON, Feb 25 (Reuters) - Russia has spent the past seven years building up formidable financial defences, yet in the long run, its economy is unlikely to withstand the onslaught of coordinated sancâ€¦ [+4615 chars]
